code: @Override public DeleteRoleRequest setRefreshPolicy(RefreshPolicy refreshPolicy) {     this.refreshPolicy = refreshPolicy.     return this. }

@Override public ActionRequestValidationException validate() {     ActionRequestValidationException validationException = null.     if (name == null) {         validationException = addValidationError("role name is missing", validationException).     }     return validationException. }
public void name(String name) {     this.name = name. }
@Override public void readFrom(StreamInput in) throws IOException {     super.readFrom(in).     name = in.readString().     refreshPolicy = RefreshPolicy.readFrom(in). }
@Override public void writeTo(StreamOutput out) throws IOException {     super.writeTo(out).     out.writeString(name).     refreshPolicy.writeTo(out). }
